summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the OneFormer segmentation processing pipeline, covering input preparation, panoptic map generation, color-to-label conversion, feature extraction, and post‑processing for instance, panoptic, and semantic segmentation across various data formats.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of OneFormer’s computer‑vision processing components to support reliable deployment in image segmentation services and related AI products.
